legal_basis: Court rules require parties to adhere to deadlines and schedules set by the court
cause_of_action: Plaintiffs repeatedly missed deadlines, including serving their affidavit of documents and conducting examinations on discovery
procedure_followed: Court issued orders and notices for status review, but plaintiffs did not comply. Defendant sought dismissal, and court reviewed the case.
decision_reasoning: Plaintiffs' failure to meet deadlines and lack of communication regarding their delays
cost_awards: no costs awarded as defendant did not claim them
